description: Warm spices, applesauce and a shredded tart apple make this homespun loaf comforting, but the gooey apple-cider glaze makes it stand out You might want to double the amount of glaze, and drizzle it over ice cream, pancakes or maybe even your morning oatmeal.
title: Cinnamon Apple Quick Bread With Apple Cider Glaze
title_page: Cinnamon Apple Quick Bread With Apple Cider Glaze Recipe - NYT Cooking
text: Warm spices, applesauce and a shredded tart apple make this homespun loaf comforting, but the gooey apple-cider glaze makes it stand out. You might want to double the amount of glaze, and drizzle it over ice cream, pancakes or maybe even your morning oatmeal.
